name: Transaction Statistics
query:
SELECT SUBSTRING(table_name, 4) as DocType, table_rows as `Number of Rows`, ROUND((DATA_LENGTH + INDEX_LENGTH) / 1024 / 1024) AS `Size (MB)`
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
    WHERE table_rows > 0
      AND SUBSTRING(table_name, 4) IN (SELECT name FROM tabDocType WHERE is_submittable = 1 and istable = 0)
    ORDER BY table_rows DESC
